concept.title: Selling in Person
concept.shortdesc: Shopify offers you the ability to sell both online and in person, expanding the possibilities for your business to grow.

conbody.p: Despite the fact that Shopify focuses on e-commerce, it also offers business owners a full retail store experience with Shopify POS app. This app allows you to create carts for customers, accept a range of payments and methods, track orders and inventory across retail locations, online stores and whatever other active sales channels youâ€™re running.
